import { useState, useCallback } from "react" import { Card, Form, Button, TextField, FormLayout, Heading, TextContainer, Page } from "@shopify/polaris" const MailingList = () => { const [url, setUrl] = useState(''); const handleSubmit = useCallback((_event) => setUrl(''), []); const handleUrlChange = useCallback((value) => setUrl(value), []); return Mailing List

Add email addresses to the mailing list that will receive notifications. Whenever a notification is triggered, an email will be sent to all the addresses on this list.

Submit} />
} export default MailingList
